job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: Principal Architect Health IQ is a community of engineers who are passionate about building quality software that rewards the health conscious. Our work environment is collaborative and ownership driven, and as a result, we build products that are well-considered and well-architected. Your skillset will grow at Health IQ. You will join a team excited about the problems we solve and the tools they use to solve them.What you will be doing:Developing new software solutions to improve the efficiencies and observability of the businessWork with key stakeholders and technical leadership to define solutions to best solve the problem at handLead development and continuously improve critical subsystemsExecute the full SDLC including requirements analysis, architecture and design specification, service development, code review, testing and deliveryWho we're looking for:Undergraduate degree in computer science, or related technical field, required; advanced degree preferred8+ years of relevant experienceTechnologiesFrontend: TypeScript/JavaScript, HTML, CSS development and the latest web-frameworks (React, Angular, etc...)Backend: Typescript/Node, Ruby, Java, Python or other server-side object-oriented languages. Experience with web frameworks such as Express, Rails, Spring, DjangoPassion for scalability, latency, stability and performance with an innate ability to understand the trade-offs between acceptable offerings and costsSelf-motivated and self-managed problem solvers able to jump-in to many areas as required
